name: theaters_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool flixster.
Tool description: This API helps to query for movies, actors, theaters, showtime, etc... to create a site/application, such as : rottentomatoes.com, flixster.com
API description: List theaters around a specified postal code or GEO location using the Flixster API.

longitude.description: The GEO longitude to search for theaters.

zipcode.description: The postal code to search for theaters. Default is '90002'.

latitude.description: The GEO latitude to search for theaters.

radius.description: The radius (in miles) around the specified location to search for theaters. Default is 50.
